A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Enjoyable to watch at first\, but as you reflect more on it you start to see its flaws and shortcomings. Not only was the story poorly written\, the characters of the original trilogy weren't fulfilled on their true potential. I would like to compare this to Valerian\, how it was extremely visibly pleasing but lacked in all other aspects of movies. it's an extremely nicely wrapped Christmas present with nothing in it.
